room_title: Escape room "Dragon Castle" by Ultimate Xscape Rooms in Bridgewater
room_description: The elderly king has died without an heir and the kingdom is in chaos! You have sworn allegiance to a young noblewoman whom you believe is the best candidate to sit upon the throne and rule the land. She has requested your aid in a secret quest – to search for and find the last remaining dragon eggs, rumored to be hidden deep within the castle. You’ll need all your wits about you to evade the castle guards, navigate dimly lit passageways, and unravel ciphers and codes. Can you find the hidden dragon eggs and restore peace and prosperity to the realm? Or will you be caught by the guards and thrown into the castle dungeon, never to be heard from again?
